ygData.subject: Re: The D.E.D flight.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hook gasped as he grabbed his shoulder wound. He noticed Longhaul panicking, and it would not help them. Longhaul. he shouted. Get me some emergency power.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Hook gasped as he grabbed his shoulder wound. He noticed Longhaul
panicking, and it would not help them. "Longhaul." he shouted. "Get me
some emergency power." he yelled in a voice suggesting Longhaul should
have been smart enough to already do it, in Hook's general snobish tone.
